alert.note: Alert for Benton; Morgan (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 01 at 5:36AM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Benton and Morgan Counties through 630 AM CDT... At 535 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Sedalia, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lake of The Ozarks, Versailles, Stover, Laurie, Barnett, Syracuse, Gravois Mills, Mora, Florence and Crockerville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
